newsitem.title: POLAND: POLISH SHARES EXTEND LOSS IN LOWER TURNOVER.
newsitem.headline: POLISH SHARES EXTEND LOSS IN LOWER TURNOVER.

text.p: 1030 GMT - Polish shares extended Wednesday's fall in lower turnover but buying was stronger after price-fixing. * The main market's WIG index fell 186.2 points, or 1.1 percent, to 16,368.3, the WIG 20 fell 1.5 percent to 1,616.9 and the parallel market's WIRR fell 1.7 percent to 3,726.6. * Turnover fell 12.7 percent to 177.9 million zlotys on all three markets as 57 issues fell, 14 rose and 16 were flat. Most active Mostostal Export fell 5.5 percent in a 17.7-million-zloty turnover. Lentex started bourse trade at 33 zlotys, 53.5 percent above issue.
